## Summary
Clearly describe the new feature or improvement you want to add.

## Goals & Motivation
Why is this feature needed? What problem will it solve or what benefits will it bring?


## Examples / References
If there are reference implementations, third-party examples, or design drafts, please attach links or sample code.
